data.text: @TLCexpat I promise you, the side effects from the Shingrix vaccine are WAY better than getting shingles. Mom and MIL had it at the same time many years ago, and were in a lot of pain.
@TLCexpat @KcWhisler I do thank God for my traditional outbreak. Some lose vision from having it on their face or mobility from it being on their legs.
@bitcoinvintage @KcWhisler Oh no! Sorry to hear you’re dealing with them. Hang in there!

@TLCexpat @KcWhisler I think they're called shingles because of how long they last. 
I'm in my 7th week. You don't want this.
@KcWhisler From everything I hear it beats dealing with them. (100.7 fever right now…ugh) https://t.co/MHSKev1DpA
@TLCexpat Ugh! I haven’t done the shingles vax yet…this is not making me run out for it 😕
@TLCexpat Sure hoping you feel better tomorrow morning! I know how you feel about the vaccine effects though. I need to do the shingles thing soon as well. Ugh.
